TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ChannelServices extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供帮助进行远程处理信道注册、解析和 URL 发现的静态方法。

span.span: Provides static methods to aid with remoting channel registration, resolution, and URL discovery.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道传输跨此类为应用程序域、 进程和计算机的远程处理边界的应用程序之间的消息。Channels transport messages between applications across such remoting boundaries as application domains, processes, and computers. 这些交叉可以是入站和出站。These crossings can be inbound and outbound. 通道可以侦听终结点上的入站消息，将发送给出站消息，还是两者都的终结点。A channel can listen on an endpoint for inbound messages, send to an endpoint for outbound messages, or both. 这提供了在运行时中插入范围广泛的协议，一个扩展点，即使运行时可能不是在另一端的通道。This provides an extensibility point in the runtime to plug in a wide range of protocols, even though the runtime might not be at the other end of the channel. 运行时对象可用于公开大量的语义和实体。Run-time objects can be used to expose a wide range of semantics and entities. 通道提供要将消息转换与特定协议的扩展点。The channel provides the extensibility point to convert the messages to and from the specific protocols. 通道必须公开接口，提供信息性的属性，如和。Channels must expose the interface, which provides informational properties such as the and . 使用注册通道方法。Channels are registered using the method. 此外可以从远程处理配置加载通道。Channels can also be loaded from the remoting configuration. (请参阅[\<通道 > 元素 （模板）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce)有关详细信息。)(See [\ Element (Template)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce) for details.) 在客户端，消息会被移交给客户端信道接收链后它们遍历客户端链。On the client side, messages are handed off to the client channel sink chain after they traverse the client chain. 第一个通道接收器通常是，该消息序列化为流关闭信道接收链传递给客户端传输接收器。The first channel sink is typically a , which serializes the message into a stream that is passed down the channel sink chain to the client transport sink. 然后客户端传输接收器将此流写出到网络。The client transport sink then writes this stream out to the wire. 在服务器端中，服务器传输接收器读取网络请求，并将请求流传送到服务器信道接收链。On the server side, the server transport sink reads requests off the wire and passes the request stream to the server channel sink chain. 服务器格式化程序接收器链末尾将反序列化请求消息。The server formatter sink at the end of this chain will deserialize the request into a message. 它将然后将此消息提交给远程处理基础结构，这将分发服务器链。It will then hand this message off to the remoting infrastructure, which will dispatch it to the server chain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 已过时。 is obsolete. 请改用 。Please use instead. 方法采用从通道对象的接口。The method takes in the interface from a channel object. 通道的必须是唯一的或必须是匿名的通道。The channel's must be unique, or the channel must be anonymous. 通道是匿名如果设置为`null`或使用`name`配置属性。A channel is anonymous if the is set to either `null` or by using the `name` configuration property. 你无法注册中的相同名称的两个通道。You cannot register two channels with the same name in a . 默认情况下，名称是"http"和名称为"tcp"。By default, the name of a is "http" and the name of a is "tcp." 因此，如果你想要注册的相同类型的两个通道，必须指定为其中一个配置属性通过指定其他名称。Therefore, if you want to register two channels of the same type, you must specify a different name for one of them through configuration properties. 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅，和[\<通道 > 元素 （模板）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see , and [\ Element (Template)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce). ## Examples [!code-cpp[HttpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpChannel/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpChannel/CS/server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpChannel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpChannel/VB/server.vb#1)]

Registers a channel with the channel services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法接收从通道对象的接口。The method receives the interface from a channel object. 通道的必须是唯一的或必须是匿名的通道。The channel's must be unique, or the channel must be anonymous. 通道是匿名如果设置为`null`或使用`name`配置属性。A channel is anonymous if the is set to either `null` or by using the `name` configuration property. 你无法注册中的相同名称的两个通道。You cannot register two channels with the same name in a . 默认情况下，名称是"http"和名称为"tcp"。By default, the name of a is "http" and the name of a is "tcp". 因此，如果你想要注册的相同类型的两个通道，必须指定为其中一个配置属性通过指定其他名称。Therefore, if you want to register two channels of the same type, you must specify a different name for one of them through configuration properties. 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)和[\<通道 > 元素 （模板）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce)。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe) and [\ Element (Template)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73399d48-f0fd-46e9-828b-6cdafde5ffce). 如果`ensureSecurity`参数设置为`true`，远程处理系统确定是否实现通道，而且如果是这样，实现了加密和数字签名。If the `ensureSecurity` parameter is set to `true`, the remoting system determines whether the channel implements , and if so, enables encryption and digital signatures. 如果通道不实现引发异常。An exception is thrown if the channel does not implement . > [!NOTE] > 设置`ensureSecurity`到`true`引发为在 Windows 98 上 (因为安全 tcp 通道不支持 Windows 9x x)，以及在所有平台上 (必须承载在 IIS 中你的服务，如果你想要使用安全 http 通道上）。Setting `ensureSecurity` to `true` throws a for the on Windows 98 (Since secure tcp channels are not supported on Windows 9x), and for the on all platforms (You must host your service in IIS if you want to use a secure http channel).

span.span: Not supported in Windows 98 for and on all platforms for .

exception.span: 如果需要安全的 HTTP 信道，请使用 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 承载服务。

span.span: Host the service using Internet Information Services (IIS) if you require a secure HTTP channel.
